hangman.NOT_PLAYABLE: This game can only be played in channels where I can send messages. This command is in accessible in user-app context, make sure you run the command in a server I am a member of or in my DM.
hangman.GAME_ACTIVE: There is already a game running in this channel, please wait for it to finish. Or run in a different channel!
